option.name: next
option.long: Show switcher if not visible and select next window.

option.name: prev
option.long: Show switcher if not visible and select previous window.

option.name: next_all
option.long: Show switcher if not visible and select next window out of all windows.

option.name: prev_all
option.long: Show switcher if not visible and select previous window out of all windows.

option.name: next_group
option.long: Show switcher if not visible and select next window of the current application.

option.name: prev_group
option.long: Show switcher if not visible and select previous window of the current application.

option.name: speed
option.long: Ring speed

option.name: timestep
option.long: Ring timestep

option.name: window_match
option.long: Windows that should be shown in ring

option.name: darken_back
option.long: Darken background when showing the ring

option.name: inactive_opacity
option.long: Amount of opacity (in percent) for windows in the ring which are not selected

option.name: overlay_icon
option.long: Overlay an icon on windows in the ring

option.name: minimized
option.long: Show minimized windows

option.name: select_with_mouse
option.long: Allow the selection of windows by just clicking on them while the switcher is active.

option.name: ring_clockwise
option.long: Rotate ring clockwise for next window instead of counterclockwise

option.name: ring_width
option.long: Ring width (in percent of the screen width)

option.name: ring_height
option.long: Ring height (in percent of the screen height)

option.name: thumb_width
option.long: Maximum horizontal size of a thumbnail in the ring

option.name: thumb_height
option.long: MaximVertical size of a thumbnail in the ring

option.name: min_brightness
option.long: Changes the minimum brightness factor for windows in the ring. The farer away windows are, the less bright are they.

option.name: min_scale
option.long: Changes the minimum scale factor for windows in the ring. The farer away windows are, the smaller are they.

option.name: window_title
option.long: Show window title if currently selected window.

option.name: title_font_size
option.long: Font size for the window title

option.name: title_font_bold
option.long: Selects if the window title should be displayed in bold font or not.

option.name: title_back_color
option.long: Background color for the window title

option.name: title_font_color
option.long: Font color for the window title

option.name: title_text_placement
option.long: Selects where to place the window title.
